summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the electric system of The City of Seattle; authorizing the issuance and sale of municipal light and power revenue bonds or notes for the purposes of providing funds for certain additions and betterments to and extensions of the existing municipal light and power plant and system of the City, refunding all or a portion of certain of the City's outstanding municipal light and power revenue bonds and paying the costs of issuing and selling the bonds or notes authorized herein; providing for the terms, conditions, covenants and manner of sale of those bonds or notes; and describing the lien of those bonds or notes.
